name: DeviceActivityCenter
desc: A class that enables an application’s extension to start monitoring scheduled device activity.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates an activity center to manage which device activities your application monitors.

items.name: func startMonitoring(DeviceActivityName, during: DeviceActivitySchedule, events: [DeviceActivityEvent.Name : DeviceActivityEvent]) throws
items.desc: Starts monitoring the specified device activity.

items.name: func stopMonitoring([DeviceActivityName])
items.desc: Stops monitoring the specified device activities.

items.name: var activities: [DeviceActivityName]
items.desc: The activities that the application’s extension currently monitors.

items.name: func events(for: DeviceActivityName) -> [DeviceActivityEvent.Name : DeviceActivityEvent]
items.desc: Fetches the events of a device activity.

items.name: func schedule(for: DeviceActivityName) -> DeviceActivitySchedule?
items.desc: Fetches the schedule of a device activity.
